record.dc:title: Left to right: Polly McCarter, Rose Carr, Emma Maples. Back left to right: Tom McCarter, Mr. Creswell
record.dc:description: Note the six-room schoolhouse (ca. 1914) in the background. The photographer was facing southeast.
